Desc.entry: Works in particular amongst the French and Lingala speaking African community in the UK and elsewhere. Aims to relieve poverty by distributing food, clothing and where appropriate provision of financial support. Advances education amongst asylum seekers by helping with reading, form-filling, CV writing, interpreting at housing, police stations, NHS appointments etc. Assists children and young people in need and promotes knowledge of the Christian faith. Aims to provide relief to the poor, sick, disabled and elderly and to advance the Christian faith through charity. Helps orphanages, widows and vulnerable people in Africa, Zambia, Congo and South Africa. A registered charity.

ProvisionPlace.entry: St Andrews United Reformed Church Hall
